metadata.name: Arkouda #1
metadata.description: Arkouda NFT is an exciting NFT project featuring 3010 exclusive tokens that will live on the Ethereum Blockchain. Each token is represented by uniquely designed characters called Arkouda Bears which will each have their own traits and are all individually created to give a distinct identity. Each character will be holding one of our special hand-drawn luxury watches. Once the tokens are held, holders will then be able to purchase real versions of those luxury watches via our website.
